org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode

Class BPOfferService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.datanode.BPOfferService

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
 class BPOfferService
extends Object
    One instance per block-pool/namespace on the DN, which handles the heartbeats to the active and standby NNs for that namespace. This class manages an instance of BPServiceActor for each NN, and delegates calls to both NNs. It also maintains the state about which of the NNs is considered active.

    • Field Detail

      • LOG

        static final org.apache.commons.logging.Log LOG

      • bpNSInfo

        NamespaceInfo bpNSInfo
        Information about the namespace that this service is registering with. This is assigned after the first phase of the handshake.

      • bpRegistration

        volatile DatanodeRegistration bpRegistration
        The registration information for this block pool. This is assigned after the second phase of the handshake.

      • dn

        private final DataNode dn

      • bpServiceToActive

        private BPServiceActor bpServiceToActive
        A reference to the BPServiceActor associated with the currently ACTIVE NN. In the case that all NameNodes are in STANDBY mode, this can be null. If non-null, this must always refer to a member of the bpServices list.

      • bpServices

        private final List<BPServiceActor> bpServices
        The list of all actors for namenodes in this nameservice, regardless of their active or standby states.

      • lastActiveClaimTxId

        private long lastActiveClaimTxId
        Each time we receive a heartbeat from a NN claiming to be ACTIVE, we record that NN's most recent transaction ID here, so long as it is more recent than the previous value. This allows us to detect split-brain scenarios in which a prior NN is still asserting its ACTIVE state but with a too-low transaction ID. See HDFS-2627 for details.

      • mReadWriteLock

        private final ReentrantReadWriteLock mReadWriteLock

      • mReadLock

        private final Lock mReadLock

      • mWriteLock

        private final Lock mWriteLock

      • verifyAndSetNamespaceInfo

        void verifyAndSetNamespaceInfo(NamespaceInfo nsInfo)
                         throws IOException
        Called by the BPServiceActors when they handshake to a NN. If this is the first NN connection, this sets the namespace info for this BPOfferService. If it's a connection to a new NN, it verifies that this namespace matches (eg to prevent a misconfiguration where a StandbyNode from a different cluster is specified)
        Throws:
        IOException

      • registrationSucceeded

        void registrationSucceeded(BPServiceActor bpServiceActor,
                         DatanodeRegistration reg)
                     throws IOException
        After one of the BPServiceActors registers successfully with the NN, it calls this function to verify that the NN it connected to is consistent with other NNs serving the block-pool.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • shutdownActor

        void shutdownActor(BPServiceActor actor)
        Called when an actor shuts down. If this is the last actor to shut down, shuts down the whole blockpool in the DN.

        actor - the actor which received the heartbeat
        nnHaState - the HA-related heartbeat contents
